name: SKI MASK HD
description:
COMING SOON! ... Sign up for release updates above.

Introducing the highly awaited Beardo Ski Mask HD! Engineered with skiers and snowboarders specifically in mind, this awesome patented design is heavily tested in both the Back Country & Park.  The 'GARY' design will give you that shocked look that everyone loves!

SKI MASK HD FEATURES:

• Backcountry & Park Tested
• The Worlds Only 360º Seemless HD design
• Anti-Microbial Material - clean and stink-free!
• Fresh Air Breathe Hole
• Anti-Fog protection when used with Goggles
• Element-repelling Flex™ Material
• O/S Stretchable Polyester
• Soft fleece lining - for temperature regulation
 • Various designs available
• Patent pending design

name: Beardo Beard Hat - KIDS
description:
Tired of waiting years for a puberty that may never come? With the new kids size Beardo Beard hat you can now have the benefits of a warm and comfortable beard! Imagine staying out in the snow for hours on end! Unfortunately, as a kid you will likely be unemployed and may need to call your parents in to complete this transaction.

The Original Beardo beard hats are:

• Suitable for ages 3-10 • Available in several color options • Very functional in cold climates • One of a kind gift ideas! • Designed with a unique hand knit pattern • Slightly slouchy and stylishly fit • Made of 100% acrylic yarn for comfort • Soft and never itchy or scratchy! • Tightly knit for the best possible quality. • Beard adjustment range of up to 14 cm! • Always re-adjustable! Don't worry about sizes. • Foldaway the beard easily for fancy dinner parties!

options.name: KIDS - Peak Rider (Black Peak Hat, Brown Beard)

name: Houdini Beanie (3in1)
description:
Yes! We ship Worldwide! This cozy product transforms from a beanie to a scarf (Neck Gaitor) to a head-wrap in just seconds! A great product to have handy for many different occasions or those day when the weather won't make up its mind! Currently available in one color (creme) as shown.

Features:

• Uniquely designed to Transform into at least 3 products  • One Wood button   • Designed with a traditional cord knit pattern • Very functional in cold climates   • Snug and stylishly fit   • Made of 100% acrylic yarn for comfort  • Soft and never itchy or scratchy! • Patent Pending Design Let your Friends and family know that you want this as a gift! Click 'like' above and write a little note!

name: Beardo Cuddle (Hoodie/Scarf)
description:
This Original Beardo design is called the 'cuddle' and it's easy to see why! The Cuddle features a warm knit hood with an attached scarf, and built-in pockets to keep your hands nice and snugly! The Cuddle can be worn in many different variations and features 2 collar-located wood buttons and loops for even more variety!

Features:

• Can be worn in many different styles • Three Wood buttons & two loops • Two pockets for your hands (end of scarf)   • Designed with a deep cord knit pattern • Very functional in cold climates   • Snug and stylishly fit   • Made of 100% acrylic yarn for comfort  • Soft and never itchy or scratchy! Want this for Christmas? Let your friends and family know by clicking the 'Like' button above and writing a note! You never know...

name: BeerMo Bottle Mustache - 6 packs
description:
The New Beardo BeerMo's™ are ideal party favours as they liven up any shindig or night out! Simply clip them on any bottled beverage! (... or baby pacifier!) The BeerMo™ Bottle mustache is available in six colors: Black, Brown, hot pink, yellow, ginger(red/orangish) and St.Patty's Green! Select either all Black packs or Mix colors below. Not only do they add some class to your drink, but they also make your bottle stand out from the crowd! You'll never lose your drink again… and you may even make a new friend! Click this to watch a Demo Video of the BeerMo bottle moustaches in action! **Customized logo printing is also available. if you would like more info about branding possibilities, email us!

BeerMo features:

• Made of hygienic and FDA approved silicone • Perfect for promoting your business or event • Can easily fit any typical bottle, mic or soothers • Lightweight and easily carried ** During Movember 2011, your donation tally was $441.78 ~ Thank you!! Movember really appreciates the support you have shown! Be sure to get involved and help support this noble cause this year! More info can be found on the Movember site Yes! We ship Worldwide.

name: Original Beard Hat (Black)
description:
Yes, we ship worldwide! Want a FREE one? .. click 'like' above and let your people know what you want for Christmas! You may get lucky! The World's Only beanie with a foldaway, detachable and adjustable beard! The Beardo beard hat is ideal for snowboarding, skiing, hiking and all other winter or outdoor sports. name: Beardo 'Legit Knit' Blue Combo
description:
You asked for it and we listened! The same great foldaway, detachable and adjustable beard as the Originals on our new sleek beanie. This Beardo combo is the perfect addition to your next trip to the slopes. It is designed smooth for a better fit under your helmet, and now comes with 2 beards (Brown and Black) so you can mix and match!

name: Snowbeard Ski Mask
description:
Not one for wearing Beanies? Snowbeard™ is our same great beard without the beanie. Ideal for use with helmets or on its own, our fleece-lined mask will keep you warm all day! It is also equipped with an elasticized strap and an adjustable neoprene strap for the best fit.

The Beardo Snowbeards are:

• Very functional in cold climates • One of a kind gift ideas! • Soft and fleece lined for comfort! • Tightly knit for the best possible quality. • Always re-adjustable! Don't worry about sizes. Yes, we ship worldwide! Want a FREE one? .. click 'like' above and let your people know what you want for Christmas! You may get lucky!

name: Beardo Ninja Ski Mask
description:
Available in two color options, this functional new Beardo design will keep you warm and stylish in all weather conditions! Can be worn as a neck wrap, hood or ninja mask!

The Ninja Ski Mask Features:

• Fleece liner • button up sides • zipper extentions • One size fits most • 100% acrylic shell Yes, we ship worldwide! Want a FREE one? .. click 'like' above and let your people know what you want for Christmas! You may get lucky!

name: November Cap (with Bendable Mo)
description:
Perfect for Movember! Finally... our bendable mustache has arrived! This is our most sought after Beardo beard hat and is fully equipped with an 18 cm bendable mustache! Handlebar, curled, bullhorns.. this one does it all! It also Comes with a stylish peak cap! (You're welcome) Click here to see a fun video of the Beardo beard beanies in action!

The Beardo beard hats and caps are:

Don't worry about sizes. • Foldaway the beard easily for fancy dinner parties! • Yes, we ship worldwide! Want one for Christmas? Click 'Like' above and tell Santa exactly what you want!
